text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I see! So it's our team name. 
We can really count on Helios to 
think up fun stuff.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
You bet～! We have tons of pics of us 
together and I've been wanting to 
upload them to Umasta under a tag! 
So, should I go with "Miracle PaHe"?!

text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I think it sounds delicious and cute. 
But… I feel a bit bad because most 
of it's my name.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
How about "HePaMi" then!? 
It's cute and sounds like a name!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Hyahahaha! That's hilarious～!! 
That's set, we're HePaMi now! Wee～iii☆

text_block_list.name: K.S.Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, sounds good! 
I'll try using that tag later too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Wei wee～iiii! Let's take a selfie in the classroom and go with #HePaMi #GangsAllHere #BestClassmates!
